message.content:
Breakfast: Start your day with a balanced breakfast. You can have whole-grain toast with avocado and tomato, yogurt with berries and nuts, or oatmeal with fruit and nuts. If you're not hungry for a full breakfast, go for a smoothie with milk/yogurt, fruits, nuts, and protein powder (if desired).
Lunch: For lunch, try a salad with mixed greens, carrots, bell peppers, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese. Dressing can be light vinaigrette or olive oil and vinegar. You can also have chicken or turkey wraps with lettuce, tomato, onion, and mustard/mayo, or a veggie burger with avocado and tomatoes.
Dinner: End the day with a balanced dinner. Try grilled salmon with roasted potatoes and broccoli. Alternatively, you can have chicken almondine (chicken breast with garlic, almonds, and parsley) with green beans and cauliflower rice. For dessert, enjoy fruits such as berries or an apple.
Drinks: Stay hydrated throughout the day by drinking plenty of water. You can also have unsweetened tea, milk, or seltzer water to add variety to your beverages. Limit sugary and caffeinated drinks like sodas, energy drinks, and sweetened teas.
